ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Re: GU Comics - Daily OnLine Comic Strip by Wo ody  Hearn
ygData.msgSnippet: Cant wait, pullilng back into port in the morning so hopefully can get a few drops this weekend.  I felt like such a loot hound when I kept asking what does
ygData.messageBody:
Cant wait, pullilng back into port in the morning so hopefully can get a few
drops this weekend. I felt like such a loot hound when I kept asking what
does this one drop what does this one drop. I think I will print up a list
before I go. I hate asking all the time, dont guess I need to know just
curious. I was reading the boards about the Enchanter robe and Absor was
saying that he didnt think the robe was supose to use a Peridot when you
casted and he was going to "look into it." I hope so I wish our robe would
cast something useful that we would never have to mem again.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: S. Rutkowski [mailto:srutkowski@...]
Sent: Tuesday, January 30, 2001 5:21 PM
To: eqenchanters@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: GU Comics - Daily OnLine Comic Strip by
Woody Hearn


Actually we've seen the opposite. The horses seem to drop a TON of
caster stuff. We've had all of 6 pieces of cleric items, lots of
rogue and warrior items, TONS of SK stuff, a few mage pieces, a high
number of enchanter items, a couple of wiz items, NO necro stuff, lots
of shaman items, and NO monk items, plus a couple of all/all stuff
like the belt, stonewood mail (30 ac + some other stats), another
GREAT wis belt and a wis bracer.

Go for the wolves and the horses and all the named you can pull
(except Ail the Elder- silence sucks) and I'm sure you'll start to see
similar drops. The named have a decent chance to drop a BP/Legs/Robe
(although we've gotten a few gloves off em too).

--- In eqenchanters@y..., "Mindseye" <mindseye@c...> wrote:
> Wish I could help but my Enchantress is only level 40 =(
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Nygaardr, FC3
> To: 'eqenchanters@egroups.com'
> Sent: Thursday, January 18, 2001 5:04 AM
> Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] GU Comics - Daily OnLine Comic Strip
by Woody Hearn
>
>
>
> Has anyone here done much in Plane of Regrowth? I have went twice
in the
> last week and stayed for 12 hours once and about 8 hours another
time. Only
> saw two caster items drop (got both of them btw =P) a pair of
Enchanter
> gloves 5ac , 9int, 9agil, 35mana , 2vs all except magic which is
1vs and a
> belt 4ac 40hps 40mana. But to spend 20 hours in a plane and only
see 2
> (TWO!) pieces of caster gear drop is pathetic. While I was there
I saw
> countless pieces of Cleric and Warrior pieces drop. Anyone else
seeing this
> as well? This place is really big and maybe my groups are just
not pulling
> the right mobs or we are not in the right area I have no idea.
Just seemed
> a bit strange to me.
>
> Mu
> Enchanter 54th Season
> Tunare Server
